TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SuppressMessageAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class SuppressMessageAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class SuppressMessageAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 取消报告特定静态分析工具规则违规，并允许多次取消单个代码项目。

span.span: Suppresses reporting of a specific static analysis tool rule violation, allowing multiple suppressions on a single code artifact.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此特性可以应用于任何应用程序元素。This attribute can be applied to any application element. 可被禁止的违规行为的完整列表，请参阅[的代码分析托管代码警告](/visualstudio/code-quality/code-analysis-for-managed-code-warnings)。For a complete list of the violations that can be suppressed, see [Code Analysis for Managed Code Warnings](/visualstudio/code-quality/code-analysis-for-managed-code-warnings). > [!NOTE] > 应用于此类，以确定是包含还是省略属性调用的条件符号指定预处理符号"CODE_ANALYSIS"。The is applied to this class, specifying the preprocessing symbol "CODE_ANALYSIS" as the conditional symbol that determines whether the attribute call is included or omitted. 如果定义了符号，则属性将包括调用;否则，将忽略该调用。If the symbol is defined, the attribute call is included; otherwise, the call is omitted. > > 右键单击 Visual Studio 中的代码分析警告**错误列表**，然后单击**禁止显示消息**即**SuppressMessage**中添加属性你的代码或项目的全局禁止显示文件。When you right-click a Code Analysis warning in the Visual Studio **Error List** and then click **Suppress Message(s)**, a **SuppressMessage** attribute is added either in your code or to the project's global suppressions file. 有关详细信息**SuppressMessage**属性以及在 Visual Studio 中，请参阅[中的源抑制概述](/visualstudio/code-quality/in-source-suppression-overview)。For more information about the **SuppressMessage** attribute and its use in Visual Studio, see [In Source Suppression Overview](/visualstudio/code-quality/in-source-suppression-overview). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用特性禁止显示性能警告消息。The following code example shows the use of the attribute to suppress performance warning messages. [!code-csharp[System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.SuppressMessageAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.SuppressMessageAttribute/CS/program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.SuppressMessageAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.SuppressMessageAttribute/VB/program.vb#1)]

Public Sub New (category As String, checkId As String)

param.name: checkId
param.span: 应用该属性的分析工具规则的标识符。

span.span: The identifier of the analysis tool rule the attribute applies to.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例，同时指定静态分析工具的类别和分析规则的标识符。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, specifying the category of the static analysis tool and the identifier for an analysis rule.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `category`参数值是特定于分析工具，通过标识的规则进行分类`checkId`参数。The `category` parameter value is specific to the analysis tool and categorizes the rule identified by the `checkId` parameter. 两个参数连接在一起窗体规则的唯一标识符。The two parameters concatenated together form a unique identifier for the rule. > [!NOTE] > 预处理器符号"CODE_ANALYSIS"必须为此属性是有效定义。The preprocessor symbol "CODE_ANALYSIS" must be defined for this attribute to be effective. 不应用该属性中的预处理器符号结果不存在。The absence of the preprocessor symbol results in the attribute not being applied. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来禁止显示警告`Microsoft.Performance`类别和`CA1801`和`CA1804`检查标识符。The following code example shows the use of the attribute to suppress warnings for the `Microsoft.Performance` category and the `CA1801` and `CA1804` check identifiers. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.SuppressMessageAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.SuppressMessageAttribute/CS/program.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.SuppressMessageAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.SuppressMessageAttribute/VB/program.vb#2)]

summary.span: 获取标识特性分类的类别。

span.span: Gets the category identifying the classification of the attribute.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性描述的工具或消息禁止显示属性适用的工具分析类别。The property describes the tool or tool analysis category for which a message suppression attribute applies. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来禁止显示警告`Microsoft.Performance`类别和`CA1801`和`CA1804`检查标识符。The following code example shows the use of the attribute to suppress warnings for the `Microsoft.Performance` category and the `CA1801` and `CA1804` check identifiers. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. value.span: 要取消的静态分析工具规则的标识符。

span.span: The identifier of the static analysis tool rule to be suppressed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 连接在一起，和属性构成唯一的检查标识符。Concatenated together, the and properties form a unique check identifier. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来禁止显示警告`Microsoft.Performance`类别和`CA1801`和`CA1804`检查标识符。The following code example shows the use of the attribute to suppress warnings for the `Microsoft.Performance` category and the `CA1801` and `CA1804` check identifiers. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. span.span: Gets or sets the justification for suppressing the code analysis message.
The justification for suppressing the message.

summary.span: 获取或设置扩展排除条件的可选参数。

span.span: Gets or sets an optional argument expanding on exclusion criteria.

value.span: 一个包含扩展的排除条件的字符串。

span.span: A string containing the expanded exclusion criteria.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性是可选参数，指定额外的排除不不够精确文本的元数据目标。The property is an optional argument that specifies additional exclusion where the literal metadata target is not sufficiently precise. 例如，不能在方法中，应用和可能需要禁止显示冲突将使违反规则时，该方法中的语句针对而非在方法中的所有语句。For example, the cannot be applied within a method, and it may be desirable to suppress a violation against a statement in the method that will give a rule violation, but not against all statements in the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用特性禁止显示警告的方法声明中的特定参数和方法中的特定字段。The following code example shows the use of the attribute to suppress warnings for a specific parameter in a method declaration and a specific field in the method. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.SuppressMessageAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.SuppressMessageAttribute/CS/program.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.SuppressMessageAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.SuppressMessageAttribute/VB/program.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Scope { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Scope : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置与属性相关的代码的范围。

span.span: Gets or sets the scope of the code that is relevant for the attribute.

value.span: 与属性相关的代码的范围。

span.span: The scope of the code that is relevant for the attribute.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性是一个可选参数，指定该属性是相关的元数据范围。The property is an optional argument that specifies the metadata scope for which the attribute is relevant. 托管元数据的可能值包括"成员"、"资源"、"模块"、"类型"、"方法"或"命名空间"。Possible values for managed metadata include "member", "resource", "module", "type", "method", or "namespace".

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Target { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Target : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置表示属性目标的完全限定路径。

span.span: Gets or sets a fully qualified path that represents the target of the attribute.

value.span: 表示属性目标的完全限定路径。

span.span: A fully qualified path that represents the target of the attribute.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性是可选参数，用于标识该属性的分析目标。The property is an optional argument identifying the analysis target of the attribute. 一个示例值是"System.IO.Stream.ctor （):System.Void"。An example value is "System.IO.Stream.ctor():System.Void". 它是完全限定的因为它可能很长，特别是对于目标，例如参数。Because it is fully qualified, it can be long, particularly for targets such as parameters. 分析工具用户界面应该能够自动格式设置参数。The analysis tool user interface should be capable of automatically formatting the parameter.
